publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-227 Nicol Stephen: Scottish University for Industry—That the Parliament welcomes the publication on 27 October of The Shortest Route to Learning, the Scottish Executive’s progress report on the development of the Scottish University for Industry and supports the creation of the Scottish University for Industry which will enable people to access learning opportunities and learn throughout life on their own terms, so increasing individual employability and economic competitiveness.
